title: ExamGenie
description: A learning aid used by teachers to generate bespoke learning materials via scheme of work.
body: Exam Genie is a learning aid used by teachers to generate bespoke revision materials in a variety of formats specially tailored to their classes scheme of work and ability level.

title: SkillFlash
description: an AI-powered flashcard app built with React Native and Typescript.
body: SkillFlash is a full-stack project written in Typescript utilsing the React Native framework. Its backend is powered by MongoDB and Express. SkillFlash is an AI-powered flash cards app which aims to help users prepare for interviews for tech roles, intepretting keywords from job descriptions in prompts to generate bespoke revision material.

title: NC News
description: a reddit-like CRUD app built with React, Node.js, Express.js and PostgreSQL.
body: Northcoders News (NC News) app is a front-end web app built using the NC-News API I built previously. It is a reddit-like news app which aggregates articles and allows users to cast votes and make comments on articles. NC News is built using Vite + React and styled using Tailwind CSS and hosted on Netlify.

title: PokeMart
description: a pokemon-based e-commerce site built with React, Next.js, and PostgreSQL.
body:
PokeMart is an e-commerce site where users can log in, add items to their basket and checkout.
In future iterations this will be incorporated as part of an Object-Oriented Pokemon battler browser game.

title: PyBase Chat
description: a discord-like instant messaging app built React + Vite on-top of a Python and FastAPI backend.
